validationErrorsMessage: There is still mandatory information missing in some of your record(s), please make sure that all records marked in red are completed.
successfulMessage: Your request to publish your country's National Targets and Mapping has been received.
successMessageNau: Your request to publish will be sent to your country's NFP who has rights to publish.
successMessagePA: Since there are number of records it will take few minutes to published them all.
nbsapMessage: This is a reminder if your country has not yet submitted NBSAPs, you can do it on CHM.
confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to proceed with publishing your countries National Targets and Mapping?
missingNationalTargets: Your country has not submitted any national targets for these Global Target(s)
missingNationalMappings: Your country has not submitted mapping information for these Global Target(s)
validatePartIAndPartII: Validate Part I and Part II
publish: Publish Part I and Part II
submitMapping: Submit your global goals/targets mapping information
welcome: Welcome to your country's National Targets submission section. please select option to proceed.
spinnerMessage: Please wait while we process your request.
tourWelcomeContent: The National targets overview screen provides an overview of both sections under national targets. It also allows you to validate and publish all information
partIContent: This section allows you to submit national targets aligned with the Global Biodiversity Framework(GBF) targets
partICountsContent: Displays your country’s national target counts (published, draft, and requested).
partIGoToContent: Access the details page for Part I.
partIValidateContent: Validate all draft national target records
partIIContent: This section allows national mapping with the Global Biodiversity Framework(GBF) Goals/Targets
partIICountsContent: Displays your country’s national mapping counts (published, draft, and requested).
partIIGoToContent: Access the details page for part II
partIIValidateContent: Validate all draft national mapping records
publishContent: Publish all draft records from Part I and II
validateContent: Validate all draft records from Part I and II
partICountContent: Total number of national targets (draft + published).
partILinkedGbfContent: GBF targets/goals linked with your country’s national target.
partIStatusContent: Indicates whether a record is published, draft, or locked.
partIICountContent: Total number of national mappings (draft + published).
